verse.name: v1
verse.lines: He's coming on the clouds, kings and kingdoms will bow down And every chain will break, as broken hearts declare His praise Who can stop the Lord Almighty?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Our God is the Lion, the Lion of Judah He's roaring with power and fighting our battles And every knee will bow before You

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Our God is the Lamb, the Lamb that was slain For the sin of the world, His blood breaks the chains And every knee will bow before the Lion and the Lamb Oh every knee will bow before the Lion and the Lamb

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: So open up the gates, make way before the King of kings Our God who calls the saved is here to set the captives free Who can stop the Lord Almighty?

verse.name: b
verse.lines: Who can stop the Lord Almighty? Who can stop the Lord Almighty? Who can stop the Lord Almighty? Who can stop the Lord?
